name: Dimension Drift
description:
A short game made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.

 You solve puzzles while switching between dimensions each having its own restrictions in movement. You can  move forward and backward in 2D, but change your depth in 3D.

Controls:
Move in 2D:  L/R arrow keys or A/D
Move in 3D: Up/Down keys or W/S
Jump: Space

Web build is unstable and has frame rate issues, windows build is recommended for best experience
